title: Cara Memasak Rendang
bahan:
Bahan:
            600 gr daging sapi sengkel, potong
            5 siung bawang putih
            7 siung bawang merah
            5 butir kemiri
            8 cabai keriting merah
            2 cabai merah
            3 cm jahe
            80 ml minyak kelapa
            2 batang serai, potong dan geprek
            1 lengkuas, iris dan geprek
            5 lembar daun jeruk purut
            2 lembar daun kunyit
            1 lembar daun pandan
            3 lembar daun salam
            500 ml air
            500 ml santan kental

            Rempah kering:
            1 sdm ketumbar bubuk
            2 sdt lada putih bubuk
            2 sdt jinten bubuk
            ¼ sdt kayu manis bubuk
            1 sdt pala bubuk
            1 sdt bunga lawang bubuk
            1 sdt kapulaga bubuk
            1 sdt cengkeh bubuk
            1 sdt cabai bubuk

            Lainnya:
            ½ sdm garam
            2 sdt gula
            1 sdt kaldu jamur

title: Cara Memasak Sop Ikan
bahan:
Bahan-bahan sop ikan khas Batam:

            4 sdm ebi disangrai dan dihaluskan
            1/2 kg ikan kakap putih
            1 buah jeruk nipis
            Sawi asin secukupnya
            7 siung bawang merah
            Sedikit minyak goreng untum menggoreng bawang merah
            10 buah tomat ijo ukuran kecil
            1 mangkuk kemangi
            1300 ml air
            1 sdt lada bubuk
            1 sdt  kaldu ayam bubuk
            1 sdt garam
            1 sdt gula pasir
            3 sdm kecap asin

title: Cara Memasak Ikan Bakar
bahan:
Ingredients
            1kg of any fish
            1 cup shallots
            2 lemongrass
            50 garlic
            50g ginger
            150- 180g dried chilies
            0.5 cup water
            0.5 cup oil + 1 cup of oil
            3-4 tbsp dried shrimp
            salt
            sugar
            2 tbsp lemon juice

title: Cara Memasak Ayam Teflon
bahan:
Resep:
            Ayam:
            100 g dada ayam boleh pake paha
            2 garlic
            1/2 sdm kecap asin
            1 sdm saus tiram
            1 tetes minyAk wijen
            1 cubit garam
            1 cubit lada
            Total 226 kalori

            Sawi putih:
            150g sawi putih
            2 garlic
            2 g cabe rawit
            1/4 sdt garam
            1 cubit merica

title: Cara Memasak Nasi Goreng
bahan:
- Bumbu merah ( untuk recipenya bisa klik di video youtube Christo & Sisca -  bumbu dasar masakan Indonesia )
            - Jinten
            - Lengkuas bubuk
            - Jahe bubuk
            - kunyit bubuk
            - ketumbar bubuk
            - cabe bubuk
            - daun jeruk
            - daun salam

title: Cara Memasak Mie Tarempa
bahan:
1.mie gepeng/ifu mie
            2.ikan tongkol (olahan)30gr
            3.garam 1/4 sdt
            4.micin 1/4 sdt
            5.merica 1/4sdt
            6.saos sambal 1sdm
            7.saos tomat 1/2 sdm
            8.saos tiram 1/2 sdt
            9.kecap asin 1/2 sdt
            10.daun bawang(garnis)
            11.bawang goreng (garnis)
            12.kuah kaldu ayam 100ml
            13.minyak goreng 2sdt
            14.bawang merah 1 siung (chop)
            15.bawang putih 2 siung (chop)
            16.kecap manis 1sdm

title: Cara Memasak Semur Daging
bahan:
Bahan:
            1/2 kg daging sapi
            4 siung bawang merah
            4 siung bawang putih
            1 buah cabe merah besar
            3 butir kemiri
            1 ruas jahe
            1/2 buah tomat
            Daun salam
            Sereh
            Lengkuas
            1 sdt garam
            1 sdt kaldu sapi bubuk
            2 sdt gula pasir
            1/2 sdt merica bubuk
            1/4 butir pala
            Kecap manis secukupnya
            Santan instan

title: Cara Memasak Tengkleng Kambing
bahan:
Ground spices :
            - 15 red onions
            - 10 cloves of garlic
            - 5 roasted hazelnuts
            - 1 large red chili
            - 2 segments of turmeric
            - 2 segments of ginger
            - 2 segments of galangal
            - 1 tbsp coriander grains
            - 1 teaspoon peppercorns
            - 1 tsp cumin

            Other Ingredients:
            - 2 stalks of lemongrass
            - 3 bay leaves
            - 5 pieces of lime leaves
            - 2 tomatoes
            - 15 red bird's eye chilies
            - 2 cm of cinnamon
            - 5 grains of cardamom
            - 5 cloves
            - 2 liters of water
            - 80 ml of coconut milk
            - 2 tablespoons of sweet soy sauce
            - 1/2 tbsp salt
            - Brown sugar
            - 1/2 tablespoons of powdered broth

title: Cara Membuat Churos
bahan:
Ingredients :
            200 ml / 13 tbsp water
            15g / 1 tbsp sugar
            1/4 tsp salt
            50g / 3 tbsp butter
            140g / 1 cup + 1/8 cup all-purpose flour
            2 egg

            Chocolate Sauce Recipe
            Ingredients:
            120 ml / 8 tbsp milk
            1 tsp sugar
            60g dark chocolate
            1 tsp corn flour
            10 ml water
